sentences.en: An amiable villain with a cocky, sidelong grin Hal Hinson.
sentences.cn: 带着一种高傲且目中无人微笑的态度和蔼的恶棍(哈尔·金森).

sentences.en: Do every workout conservatively, but with a cocky attitude.
sentences.cn: 在每次高强度的训练时, 以自信的态度保存一些体力.

sentences.en: Don't get cocky when you've achieved something.
Everyday she steps into her office, cocky as the king of spades.
sentences.cn: 每天她走进办公室的样子都是趾高气昂的.

sentences.en: He assumed Croft would like him better if he weren't too cocky.
sentences.cn: 他觉得,只要自己别太自命不凡克洛夫特会更喜欢他.

sentences.en: He is too cocky, I don't like him.
sentences.cn: 他太骄傲了, 我不喜欢他.

sentences.en: He is too cocky, Let's cut him down to size.
sentences.cn: 他太骄傲了.让我们揭穿他的底细.

sentences.en: He is very cocky, his tail sticking high up in the air.
sentences.cn: 他骄傲得不得了, 尾巴翘到天上去了.

sentences.en: He was a little bit cocky when he was about 11 because he was winning everything.
sentences.cn: 11岁左右的时候，他就有点自以为是，因为他那时从未失败过。

sentences.en: He’s a cocky little man and I don’t like him.
sentences.cn: 他是个傲慢自大的小子，我不喜欢他。

sentences.en: It's funny to see the faces of those cocky boys.
sentences.cn: 看到那些过度自信的对手脸上的表情,我觉得很有趣.

sentences.en: The area is almost back to its cocky self.
sentences.cn: 整个地区几乎回到了以前空前繁华的样子.

sentences.en: The Pomeranian is cocky, commanding , and animated as he gaits.
sentences.cn: 博美的步态骄傲 、 庄重而且活泼.

sentences.en: Their demands were still too cocky and unrealistic.
sentences.cn: 他们的要求还是过于趾高气扬,不切实际.

sentences.en: Tom used to be a very cocky young man.
sentences.cn: 汤姆过去是个非常傲慢自大的年轻人.

sentences.en: You're just a pathetic teacher, cocky bastard!
sentences.cn: 你只是个可悲的教师, 自大的杂碎!

words.tran_cn: 确信的；独断的；过分自信的

trans.tran_cn: 狂妄自信的，骄傲的，自大的，过于自信的
trans.tran_en: too confident about yourself and your abilities, especially in a way that annoys other people
